vote.title: Authorize a development loan agreement with Builders of Hope CDC and/or its affiliates, for the acquisition and development of a 36-unit mixed-income affordable multifamily complex to be known as Trinity West Villas, located at Singleton Boulevard and Pointer Street Dallas, Texas - Not to exceed $1,906,419.00 - Financing: HOME Investment Partnership Program Funds ($611,227.47) and Neighborhood Stabilization Program (NSP) Funds ($1,295,191.53)
vote.description: Authorize a development loan agreement with Builders of Hope CDC and/or its affiliates, for the acquisition and development of a 36-unit mixed-income affordable multifamily complex to be known as Trinity West Villas, located at Singleton Boulevard and Pointer Street Dallas, Texas - Not to exceed $1,906,419.00 - Financing: HOME Investment Partnership Program Funds ($611,227.47) and Neighborhood Stabilization Program (NSP) Funds ($1,295,191.53)
